column5: Walked out at 6am this morning. Following my newfie gps once again. Wouldnt you know it, I was right on my spot from yesterday. Didnt take long to get them top side. Off the ice by 9am. Got to love having the lake at your front door.  Those are 2+ lb herring. MONSTERS, They hammered that spoon, and gave a nice thumping fight. All came on the half & half again.
Nice buddy... was going to stop by but went to different spot ended up putting a beating on them myself
nice dinner there  looks like the ice has finally firmed up, you got what ? 6-8" there ?
Great job,thinking may have to secretly follow you next Sat lol !!!!!

Ice is 9"-10".  James I figured that since I got no text. I had two smash the meegs, but I cant for the life of me, get them top side. Thats why I went back to the lazy flip/flop spoon. I cant put that thing down ever since Andy showed me the correct way to fish it. Those herring were zinging mid depth chasing shinners just at first light.  Davey,if you can find me, you can join me. Newfie gps is only $9.99 plus coffee.
Was too busy to text.  11/17 and managed to film the way to jig it and even got a few hits on film and got the fish topside. I'll send u the link on u tube once I upload it
Spent the morning at shanty zippo for takers lots of window shoppers. Everyone i talked to in same boat gave up at 1
Meegz, can you send me the link too? I'd love to see it.
Awesome catch man. We were out there & put a beating on them as well. Don't fish the lady too often but today was a great day

hope u have a spare room for next winter or even a dog house not that i havent been in one before lol , good catch and eats, like i said yesterday a group of people killed the lake i fished on, very few lakes with access up here, good on you try them fried with a bit of bacon grease,,,,,,oh boy,,,, used to put them in a smoker also mmmmmmmm    Brian, your out fishing us
Sweet! Those herring look great, not like the gross fat wormy Nipising herring
Nicely done Brian!!  This weekend was solid for you!
Nice B, good for you.  Too bad I had to work

Awesome catch man. We were out there & put a beating on them as well. Don't fish the lady too often but today was a great day  Glad you had a good day and found a safe place to fish bud. I didnt want to lead you out to where I have not been.   Nice B, good for you.  Too bad I had to work  The weekend should be good J. Maybe you and Paul can come up for a fish.   Nicely done Brian!!  This weekend was solid for you!  I like the way they like to clap when they are on the ice. AA job well done sorta clap. LOL
